viewer_id: The ID of the viewer to use
box_id: The ID of the box to use
region: A valid region - rect, circ, amp, or sel
num_bins: The number of bins to use for the histogram. (Use "auto" to let backend automatically decide binning.)
min: Minimum value of histogram range. ("auto" will use the minimum pixel value inside the region)
max: Maximum value of histogram range. ("auto" will use the maximum pixel value inside the region)
[scale]: The axis scaling type - lin (for linear) or log (for logarithmic)
new_value: The new value, leave empty for the default value
